apple_vendor_description: This couple emoji on Apple devices portrays a tender moment, with a man and a woman leaning in for a kiss, rendered in distinct dark and medium-light skin tones. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft highlights give their faces a romantic glow and a sense of gentle connection. The smooth gradients in their features and clothing convey affection and intimacy, making it a perfect symbol for romantic expressions and declarations of love shared on Apple devices.
